name: Dragon Quest Monsters 2 - Iru to Ruka no Fushigi na Fushigi na Kagi [3DS]
description:
Dragon Quest Monsters 2: Iru to Ruka no Fushigi na Fushigi na Kagi is a RPG game developed by Square Enix. It came out on 06-02-2014. Square Enix published the game.
You can play Dragon Quest Monsters 2: Iru to Ruka no Fushigi na Fushigi na Kagi on iOS, Android and Nintendo 3DS.
